column1: Questions
column12: Answer 2
column14: Answer 3

column1: If a child record in a master-detail relationship is deleted, the parent is deleted.
column12: True

column1: A field designated as required, is only required when it is added to a user's page layout.
column12: False

column1: A user's profile does not have any permissions to view a custom object. However, the Organization Wide Defaults for the custom object are set to Public Read/Write. Users with this profile will still be able to access the custom object.
column12: False

column1: If a field update for Rule1 triggers Rule2, and a field update for Rule2 triggers Rule1 ___________.
column10: Loop is allowed to run 25 times within one hour. If it does not end on its own the process will be stopped by R&D.
column12: The updates create a loop and the org limits for workflow time triggers per hour will likely be violated.
column14: When the second trigger is saved an Imminent Loop Error message will be displayed and the workflow rule update will not save.
column16: The updates create a loop and the org be blocked until the admin resolves the issue.

column1: A user asks for a checkbox to be automatically ticked if the annual revenue field is greater than a million.Which formula to trigger a workflow would satisfy this requirement?
column12: AnnualRevenue > 1000000 , TRUE, FALSE
column14: IF(AnnualRevenue > 1000000 ,"TRUE","FALSE")

column1: Customer services wish to analyze how many open cases there are each day over a period of time.How can they achieve this? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: Matrix Reports
column14: Tabular Reports

column1: Custom objects on the "detail" side of a master-detail relationship cannot have sharing rules. (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: True

column1: Standard picklist fields can be controlling or dependent. (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: True

column1: Select the data types that are supported by formula fields. (Choose three.)
column12: Currency
column14: Email

column1: How do you highlight totals in a report?
column12: Custom Summary Field
column14: Formula Field

column1: Your manager has asked you to create an object with radio buttons that track a rating of 1-5.How will you achieve this?
column10: Create a dependent picklist that feeds the radio button type field.
column12: Create a Visualforce page with radio buttons.
column14: Create a radio button with 5 option.

column1: What can a cross-object formula reference?
column12: Both Parent and Child objects
column14: Child Only

column1: ABC Company has a workflow on opportunity that will change the status field to "In Progress" when the Stage field is changed "Negotiation." In addition, there is a validation rule on Status that will prevent the status being set to "In Progress" if the amount of the opportunity is less than $10,000. A user named Frank does not have FLS to see status.When Frank changes opportunities to a stage of "Negotiation" the status is still being changed to "In Progress", why is this occurring?
column10: Updates to records based on workflow rules don't trigger validation rules, workflow rules can invalidate previously valid field.
column12: Workflow rules occur after validation rules and thus override validation rules.
column14: Field Level Security prevents the validation rule from running.

column1: In order to create an App Launcher component in Lightning an admin must ___________.
column10: Join the pilot Lightning App Builder team.
column12: Purchase a license for the Lightning App Builder.
column14: Contact Salesforce to have the component activated for the Lightning App Builder.
column16: Navigate to Setup-Customize-User Interface to enable the component for the Lightning App Builder.

column1: ABC Company want to store an area code and wants to be able to search for it in searches.Which are possible fields to store the data? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: Phone
column14: Text

column1: Object A has a lookup to object B.Which of the following statements are true? (Choose two.)
column10: Fields of object B can be accessed from object A.
column12: Fields of both B and A are accessible from object A.
column14: Fields of object A can be accessed from object.
column16: Fields of both A and B are accessible from object.

column1: ABC Company has a custom object "Service" which has a lookup relationship to Account. ABC Company wants to enhance Salesforce1 with an action that allows account managers to enter a new service to an Account while looking at the account.What should be done?
column10: Enter an object specific action to Service and put it in the Account Layout.
column12: Enter an object specific action to Service and put it in the Service Layout.
column14: Enter an object specific action to Account and put it in the Service Layout.
column16: Enter an object specific action to Account and put it in the Account Layout.

column1: How can an App Builder share Favorites with other Salesforce users? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Share link in the Favorites drop-down menu.
column12: Sharing can only be performed by users with System Administrator rights.
column14: Favorites Settings under My Personal Information.
column16: Favorites can't be shared with other users.

column1: A developer wants to make sure that all fields on his new custom object are editable to all profiles.What should be checked on field level security?
column12: Enable Visible but Disable Read-Only.
column14: Disable Visible but Enable Read-Only.

column1: What are the three groups of Lighting Components you can add, when working with the Lightning App Builder? (Choose three.)
column12: Standard
column14: Custom

column1: How can you make a field mandatory? (Choose three.)
column12: Check the required field box on the page layout.
column14: Check the required field box on the field definition.
column16: Creating a validation rule for the field.
column18: Check the required field box for the field on the record type.

column1: ABC Company installs an unmanaged package.Which of the following are true? (Choose two.)
column10: Unmanaged packages have a namespace prefix.
column12: Components of unmanaged packages can be edited.
column14: Unmanaged packages don't have a version number.

column1: ABC Company is using assignment rules to distribute cases to regional teams.Which of the following is true?
column10: Cases may be assigned to public groups (if configured).
column12: It is possible to have multiple active assignment rules.
column14: Cases may be assigned to queues (if configured).
column16: A workflow field update can be used instead.

column1: In a master-detail relationship scenario, the fields of the parent object need to be displayed in the related list.How will a developer achieve this design?
column12: Validation rule
column14: Assignment rule

column1: A user has requested a field that counts the number of child records associated with a custom object. These custom objects have a lookup relationship between each other.Which feature would best accomplish this requirement?
column12: Roll-Up Summary Field
column14: Lightning Process Builder

column1: Before code can be deployed in production, what percentage of test coverage must be achieved?

ABC Company wants to rollout new product bundles with several pricing options. Pricing options include product-price bundles, account specific pricing and more.Which product satisfies the needs? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: Formula fields on Opportunity/Opportunity Product.
column14: Lightning process builder.

column1: If ABC Company wants to refresh a sandbox weekly with some example data, which sandbox should ABC Company create?
column12: Developer Pro Sandbox
column14: Partial Copy Sandbox

column1: An admin is trying to add a custom VF page to the mobile app quick navigation menu but can't.What might be the problem?
column10: Menu hasn't been configured for VF page.
column12: VF page has fields that profile can't access.
column14: VF page doesn't have a tab.

column1: What is a self-relationship?
column10: A lookup field to the user object.
column12: A lookup to the global search.
column14: A relationship of account to opportunity owned by the same owner.
column16: A lookup field to the same object.

column1: You want to use an External Data Object Table from Heroku carrying Product Category information. The data need to be included in Salesforce and searchable.What do you have to do before you can use the connection? (Choose three.)
column12: Choose "Include in Salesforce searches" option.
column14: URL/choose the URL.

column1: ABC Company want to store an area code and wants to be able to search for it in applications (apex).Which are possible fields to store the data? (Choose two.)
column12: Phone
column14: Text

column1: How can an App Builder determine whether the features and customizations made in an org are Lightning-ready?
column10: Launch the Lightning Experience Readiness Check from All Setup.
column12: Download the Lightning Experience Audit Tool from AppExchange.
column14: Use the Lightning Experience Readiness Toolkit in Workbench.
column16: Implement the salesforce Lightning Design System in a sandbox.

column1: A developer has completed work in the sandbox and is ready to send it to a related org.What deployment tool should be used?
column12: Changes Sets
column14: Unmanaged Packages

column1: A salesperson at AW Computing only sees the Social Contacts link for Twitter and not Facebook on his records.Why would this be happening? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: None of his Facebook contacts have confirmed the nature of their relationship.
column12: The administrator hasn't enabled Social Contacts for Facebook.
column14: The salespersons login with Facebook has expired.
column16: Facebook is no longer supported by Social Contacts.

column1: Field type conversion.Which of the following are true? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Data can be lost when converting from auto-number to text.
column12: Data can be lost converting from number to currency (assuming that field lengths are identical).
column14: Data can be lost when converting from simple picklist to multi picklist.
column16: Information can be lost when converting from text area (rich) to text area (long).

column1: What are the three different custom tabs you can create? (Choose three.)
column12: Visualforce Tab
column14: Standard Object Tab

column1: Two custom objects exist with a Master-Detail relationship. Your company now needs to count and display the number of child objects associated with the parent.Which feature can best satisfy this requirement?
column12: Lightning Process Builder
column14: Visual Flow

column1: Identify the standard Lightning components. (Choose four.)
column12: Rich Text
column14: Visualforce Page

column1: Which social network is available in the Lightning Experience and Salesforce1?
column12: Klout
column14: Facebook

column1: Which two features should be used to allow users to access Flows? (Choose two.)
column12: Quick Action
column14: Flow Launcher

column1: Universal Containers wants to understand return on investment for the latest advertising buy. They currently use a private security model for all objects.What should an app builder recommend?
column10: Utilize Account Hierarchies and Roll-Up Summary fields
column12: Configure Campaign Hierarchies and Campaign statistics
column14: Run an opportunities pipeline report
column16: Change to a public security model

column1: An app builder wants to deploy a new version of an auto launched flow to production in an active state so that the new functionality is immediately available to users.What should the app builder take into consideration when planning the deployment? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Include the Process Builder calling the Flow in the deployment
column12: Verify there is a static resource that provides test coverage for the Flow
column14: Verify there is an Apex test that provides test coverage for the Flow
column16: Include the profiles that access the flow in the deployment

column1: At Universal Containers, all US Sales Reps should be able to view the US Team Dashboard. However, only the US Sales Directors should be able to see the data in the component and view its source report.How can an app builder ensure the proper access is granted?
column10: Share the dashboard folder with roles and subordinates of the US Sales Director and share the report folder with the role of US Sales Director
column12: Make the US Sales Director the running user and share the dashboard folder with the role US Sales Rep
column14: Share the dashboard with the Public Group US Sales Reps and share the dashboard source reports folder with the US Sales Director profile
column16: Make the dashboard dynamic and give US Sales Reps the View My Team's Dashboard permission

column1: At Universal Containers, each admin and developer use a separate developer pro sandbox. Configuration and code are then migrated to a partial data sandbox for combination and initial testing. Once approved the configuration and code are then migrated to a full sandbox for final load and regression testing before going to production.When should the full sandbox be refreshed?
column10: After each major release to production
column12: After each push from the partial data sandbox
column14: After a new user is added to production
column16: After user acceptance testing is complete

column1: Universal Containers uses a custom object called Projects. When managers assign projects they set a custom field on the Project record called Estimated Hours.Once set, users should be able to decrease but not increase the value.How can an app builder meet this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Create a validation rule that uses the PRIORVALUE function
column12: Create a process builder to update the record type
column14: Create a formula field that uses the PREVGROUPVAL function
column16: Create a formula default value for the custom field

column1: Universal Containers allows all employees to submit reviews for leadership using a custom object. These reviews should only be visible to the HR department and the employee who submitted the review.Which three steps should an app builder take to properly control access to review records? (Choose three.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Remove review read permission from non-HR Department user Profiles
column12: Add a Master-Detail(User) field on the Review object
column14: Set Org Wide Default to Private
column18: Create a criteria-based Sharing Rule for the HR Department

column1: Universal Containers require different fields to be filled out at each stage of the Opportunity sales process.What configuration steps can an app builder use to meet this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Define record types and page layouts for each stage
column12: Set page layout required fields based on the current stage
column14: Create a Process Builder to prompt the User for field information
column16: Add the Path component to the Lightning record page

column1: The case handling process at Universal Containers includes multiple steps including approvals, notifications, and fields updates. To manage and evaluate all of these changes in a single save operation, an app builder wants to use Process Builder and the Advanced option to let the process evaluate a record multiple times has been selected.What option should the App Builder avoid to prevent recursion?
column12: Invocable processes
column14: IF statements
column16: Setting a criteria node to No criteria-just execute the procedure

column1: Sales Managers want to be automatically notified any time there is a change to an Opportunity Close Date and want these changes to be tracked on theOpportunity.Which two configurations should an app builder recommend? (Choose two.)
column12: Use Process Builder on Opportunities and a Chatter post action
column14: Create an Opportunity outbound message

column1: Universal Containers has two types of applicants, hourly and salary. There are separate record types for each. While all members of the human resource department need to be able to view all applicant records, only the hiring manager and VP of HR should be able to create salary applicant records.What should the app builder recommend to meet this requirement?
column10: Configure the hourly record type as the default and instruct non-management users to accept the default record type.
column12: Create a permission set containing the salary record type and assign it to the appropriate users.
column14: Remove ג€createג€ permission for the salary applicant object for everyone except the manager and VP.
column16: Update the org-wide default to private and create a sharing rule for the role of recruiting manager.

column1: How should an app builder configure access to a contact's Twitter profile for Salesforce mobile app users?
column10: Add the Twitter component to mobile view Lightning pages
column12: Add a Twitter Quick Action to the mobile navigation
column14: Add an AppExchange Lightning Component to the mobile app
column16: Add a formula field to the Contact page layout

column1: Universal Containers (UC) wants to deliver purchased containers to remote construction sites. These locations are missing a traditional street address. In these cases the customer will supply UC with the coordinates to the location.What type of field should the app builder use to capture this information?
column12: Number
column14: Text

column1: Universal Containers wants to display the real-time stock price for each Account on the Account record page.How should an app builder implement this request?
column10: Add a Dynamic Report to the page layout
column12: Install a solution from the AppExchange
column14: Build a Visual Flow that uses API calls

column1: Universal Containers (UC) wants to build a Recruiting app that allows for multiple Positions to appear on custom objects Websites and Postings. UC requires a report that shows the related custom objects of Postings.Which two items should an app builder configure to implement this? (Choose two.)
column10: Create two new Custom Report Types
column12: Configure a Postings object with Lookup field to both Positions and Websites
column14: Configure a Postings object with Master-Detail field to both Positions and Websites

column1: A new field has been added to the Applicant object. A recruiter ran the `˜Position with or without Applicants' report and noticed that the new field was missing as an option to add as a column.How should an app builder troubleshoot this issue? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Check ג€Allow Reportsג€ for the position and applicant objects
column12: Adjust the field level security to include in the report type
column14: Add the field to the custom report type field layout
column16: Update the profile with the ג€Manage Public Reportsג€ permission

column1: When an opportunity is closed date is pushed more than 30 days, manager approval is required. An approval process is in place but reps frequently forget to submit for approval to run the process.How can an app builder ensure that these opportunities are submitted into the approval process?
column10: Use a validation rule and an email alert to the manager requesting approval
column12: Change the entry criteria on the approval process to criteria are met and lock the record on initial submission
column14: Give the manager the ג€API Enabledג€ permission to permit approval responses by email
column16: Submit the record for approval from an automated process

column1: Universal Containers generates leads from three different sources: web, trade shows, and partners. Some of the information collected is applicable to all sources, there is also information that is unique to each type of lead.What should an app builder configure to meet these requirements?
column10: Create three sections on the lead layout and instruct users to collapse the non-relevant fields
column12: Create a partner community and a record type for web and trade show leads
column14: Create custom page layouts for each type of lead only containing the relevant fields
column16: Create three lead record types each with its own page layout containing the relevant fields

column1: Universal Containers created a custom object called Component to capture details about products sold.What approach should an app builder take to show Component as a related list on Product?
column10: Create a master-detail relationship on Product to Component. Add the Component related list to the Product page layout
column12: Create a lookup relationship on Component to Product. Add the Component related list to the Product page layout
column14: Create a junction object to relate Component and Product. Add the Component related list to the Product page layout
column16: Create a roll-up on Product. Add the Component related list to the Product page layout

column1: Universal Containers wants to track installation information once a container has been purchased on a custom object. Sales reps should have visibility of all the installations associated with their opportunities.What kind of relationship should this new object have to the Opportunity? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column12: Many to Many
column14: Lookup
